body:
Have a girl to talk with
Have a girl to punch with
When will i have a girl to fuck with?
I adore this. Is this the fabled "To Wholesome To Fap To" doujin?

This feels too realistic for a hentai in general, like it's a plot for a manga where they are so casual with each other that when they're not in a relationship they go to each other's house and fuck, play games, fuck again and just hang out. They probably hang out normally when they're in a relationship which actually causes they're relationships too not last. It will take a miracle to make them realise they love each other or one of them almost marrying. ... woah how the hell did my brain dart create this!?
Pretty vanilla and realistic as @Karlongkar mentioned, this guy sure know how to make sex look natural and realistic between couples or lovers. Although they seems to be more like "Fuck Friends"
It's one of the rare when it seems like author really know how to fuck
about half way through the art got better. nice job.
Is their relationship gonna any further at this point or are they just gonna remain fuck buddies? Might as well make them get together and turn this into a vanilla doujin, even if she is used goods.
I can't even fap to this. It's too good.

This is nice and all But can't we just get this when it's done ?  This turning into another thing like that Danganronpa Doujin from a while back , the with the necrophilia.  I admit that this one is more enjoyable (by a longshot even) but it's still getting tiresome
